summary: This is an email transmitting the Office of Professional Responsibility's (OPR) final report on the Jeffrey Epstein matter to the Southern District of New York (SDNY). It includes the report and a transmittal letter as attachments.
keyFacts: The Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR) completed its final report on the Jeffrey Epstein matter.
The report was transmitted to the Southern District of New York (SDNY) on November 12, 2020.
The transmission included the report and a transmittal letter as attachments.
